Table.name: SMSMI
Table.sql: select * from SMSMI where shipment_id IN (SELECT shipment_id FROM SMRV WHERE Reserve_No=':=uid')

Table.name: SMBID
Table.sql: SELECT SMBID.* FROM SMBID , SMRV A WHERE SMBID.SHIPMENT_ID= A.SHIPMENT_ID AND LSP_NO=A.TRUCKER AND SMBID.TRAN_TYPE='T' AND A.RESERVE_NO=':=uid'

Table.name: SMRCNTR
Table.sql: select * from SMRCNTR where shipment_id IN (SELECT shipment_id FROM SMRV WHERE Reserve_No=':=uid')

Table.name: SMRDN
Table.sql: select * from SMRDN where shipment_id IN (SELECT shipment_id FROM SMRV WHERE Reserve_No=':=uid')
